name: Nature`s Secrets Cucumber Face Wash
description: Nature Secret Cucumber soft facial wash for oily skin. Reduce excess oil and pimples with the richness of Cucumber extract. Cucumber Face Wash is scientifically proven to contain natural anti-oxidants. It’s never too late to revitalise for a fresher and radiant look. Skin Friendly at pH 5.5-6.0 and 100% soap free. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
